Wrong lexicographical order for 'com.google.common.collect.Lists' import. Should be before 'org.springframework.security.core.context.SecurityContextHolder'.

Method type name 'Result' must match pattern '(^[A-Z][0-9]?)$|([A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9]*[T]$)'.
Method type name 'ReturnType' must match pattern '(^[A-Z][0-9]?)$|([A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9]*[T]$)'.
